name: MIRRIR
description:
Challenge yourself by controlling yourself and a clone, and see how long you can survive. An endless experience getting harder the more you progress. Level up and unlock new cosmetics. Test your reactions and multitask thinking capabilities by playing this game.

⦿ Play offline and for free.

⦿ Amazing music to listen to and vibe to.

⦿ Splendid graphics with easy customizability.

⦿ Customize your gameplay with vibrant colours.

⦿ 4 levels of difficulty to test your limits.

⦿ Simple to understand, but challenging to play.

Tap the top side of the screen to switch the gravity of the top player and tap the bottom side of the screen to switch the gravity of the bottom player. Simple right?

Help us out by giving us reviews and ideas for upcoming updates!
